page.title: 17TEMPLETON SHOWS.
page.content:
The Vintage Show is held on the Airfield in August.It costs Â£3,000 to produce.The show attracts 5,000 to 26,000 people depending on the weather.Admission is Â£1 for adults and 50p for children.There are displays of engines,tractors,steamrollers,railway engines and events such as Army display teams and helicopter rides.
The Agricultural Show is held in August and is organized by the Young Farmers' Club.There are classes for needlework and craft and horticultural sections.Animal sections include beef and milk cattle, sheep,goats and sometimes pigs.There are also classes for horses and pets.There are stalls for flowers and vegetables.Displays include folk dancing and sheep dog trials.
